snippet: In recent weeks, the planned auction has sparked a public controversy in the country, led by opposition lawmakers and artists who have argued that the Miró collection was now part of Portugal’s cultural heritage.
abstract: In recent weeks, the planned auction has sparked a public controversy in the country, led by opposition lawmakers and artists who have argued that the Miró collection was now part of Portugal’s cultural heritage.

headline.main: Christie's Cancels Sale of Joan Miro Works Owned by Portugal
